title: Yenadi Nee Song Lyrics Adhagappattathu Magajanangalay
stanzas:
Yenadi Nee Song Lyrics Adhagappattathu Magajanangalay

yenadi nee enna ippadi aakkuna
kaathala sattunnu kannula kaattuna
modhamum kaiyila vanthathu pola
megathu mela naan vaikkiraen kaala
vaerathum thonala adiye
aanandham thaangala

vaerathum thonala adiye
aanandham thaangala

yenadi nee enna ippadi aakkuna
kaathala sattunnu kannula kaattuna

mettil isaignani endrum azhagaaga
seikindra maayam pola
ennil pala nooru inbam thara neeyum
vanthaaye koodi vaazha
nidhamum koyil sendru
varum baktharakal seivathu yaagam

athanai paerum yaenga varam
ennaidam vanthathu yogam
pothum ithu pothum
unathuanbakku eedillai yaethum
yaenadi nee enna ippadi aakkuna
kaathala sattunnu kannula kaattuna

thannanthani veedu selvam pathinaaru
vanthaalum thevai neeye
annai madi vaasam unnil thinam veesa
kondaene kaathal noyae
ethanai kodi jenmam
uyire vanthathu unaiyum thedi
oppanai yaethum illa unnai
vittengu sendridum odi
naadi unnai koodiÂ 
varum inbathil kooraene aadi

yenadi nee enna ippadi aakkuna
kaathala sattunnu kannula kaattuna
modhamum kaiyila vanthathu pola
megathu mela naan vaikkiraen kaala
vaerathum thonala adiye
aanandham thaangala

vaerathum thonala adiye
aanandham thaangala

yenadi nee enna ippadi aakkuna
kaathala sattunnu kannula kaattuna
